summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6218 for the improvement of the alley in Block H, 4th Addition, as laid off Wm. N. Bell, being the alley between 1st Ave. and 2nd Ave. from Eagle Street to Broad Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88687, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
